attributes.action: Announce a general election on his departure, and let the public choose the next prime minister
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
My petition is about the right to choose who runs the country instead of allowing it to happen behind closed doors. The argument of 'you knew who you were voting for' doesn't wash with the majority. We knew we were voting for Mr Blair to run the government and we want to have the right to choose once he steps down from office.

Let's stop Gordon getting his hands on the house next door - we want the right to decide who sits in No. 10!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
